特記事項: 【合併】Seminar in Global Diversity　（大学院共通科目・認定科目前期）/Seminar in Global Diversity　（経営戦略研究科）
授業方法: This course will be conducted face to face on campus in principle.  However, when there are students who cannot physically come to campus due to restrictive measures taken against the pandemic, sessions will be conducted in hybrid manner that employs interactive online schooling.  Documents and resources for the course will be uploaded on the website so that the students will have access to them when they join sessions online.  (Please note that the situation of pandemic might necessitate a change of the course Format.)
